info: Process sentiment analysis on the incoming text.

name: Positive
payload: I am very pleased with the service.  This is an excellent product!
info: The text of a positive sentiment message.

name: Negative
payload: I am not happy.  The product did not meet my expectations.
info: The text of a negative sentiment message.

name: Debug sentiment output
info:
Log the resulting sentiment (contained in `msg.sentiment`)
to the debug panel for review.

name: README
info:
This example allows you to submit both positive
and negative sentiment into the sentiment
processing.  The results are logged to the debug panel.
Clicking on the Positive inject starts a flow with
a positive sentiment text message while clicking
on the Negative inject starts a flow with a negative
sentiment.
